comment.author: 38003584@N08
comment._content: Is this hotel still standing?  Great shot!

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mariafranklin] The hotel burnt down in April 1951 nla.gov.au/nla.news-article2827040 The staff quarters were the only portion of the building to survive and were rebuilt as Sponar's Lakeside Inn in 1959. www.environment.nsw.gov.au/resources/parks/resort_roundup... -AG
